sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Finds duplicate system_id jobs and re-runs SchedulerVNCC for nodes which have duplicate system_id jobs</description>
        <name>Clean up duplicate system_id child jobs</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    if (pm.isZboot())
        return;

    var ga = new GlideAggregate("sys_trigger");
    ga.setWorkflow(false);
    ga.addNotNullQuery("parent");
    ga.addNotNullQuery("system_id");
    ga.addQuery("system_id", "!=", "ALL NODES");
    ga.addQuery("system_id", "!=", "ACTIVE NODES");
    ga.addAggregate("COUNT", "system_id");
    ga.groupBy("system_id");
    ga.groupBy("parent");
    ga.query();

    var nodeSystemIds = {};
    while (ga.next()) {
        if (parseInt(ga.getAggregate("COUNT", "system_id")) > 1) {
            nodeSystemIds[ga.getValue("system_id")] = true;
        }
    }

    for (var systemId in nodeSystemIds) {
        var node = new GlideRecord("sys_cluster_state");
        node.addQuery("system_id", systemId);
        node.addQuery("status", "online");
        node.query();
        if (node.next()) {
            gs.print("Re-running SchedulerVNCC for node: " + systemId + " since duplicate system_id jobs found pinned to this node");
            new SchedulerVNCC().propagateRATriggersForNode(node);
        }
    }
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-03-02 19:46:06</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>9af989b453460110b72addeeff7b122d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Clean up duplicate system_id child jobs</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="System Scheduler" source="com.glide.system_scheduler">4433b8603c31311068bcf327dfe37f6e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_9af989b453460110b72addeeff7b122d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-03-02 19:49:43</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Clean up duplicate system_id child jobs
